question:
The runners on a cross country team ran a 5-mile race at average (arithmetic mean) speeds ranging from 4 miles per hour to 7 miles per hour, inclusive. Which of the following are possible race completion times for individual members of the team?
Indicate
all
such times.
A. 36 minutes
B. 48 minutes
C. 60 minutes
D. 75 minutes
E. 90 minutes
F. 120 minutes
Show
Hide
Answer
